name: Breaking Dimension
description:
A VIDEO GAME BY: Henry Sarunic, Charlie Earnshaw, James Watson and Floyd WIlliams. 

This game focuses on collecting objects and solving puzzles as you venture between dimensions! With many monsters to stand in your way!

For the game jam this game was made for, we used the them There and back in terms of the need to switch between the (denim jeans) pocket dimension.

Follow us @team.walrust
